title: EIB Operations Inside the European Union 2018
snippet: This annual report provides a comprehensive overview of the European Investment Bank’s activities in 2018 and our support for innovation and skills, financing for small business and mid-caps, infrastructure and the environment.

autonomous electric shuttles and taxis.    The company builds driverless collective transport vehicles,mostly covering the first and last mile of journeyson closed or private sites, as a complement to existingtransport services. Because the use of autonomousvehicles on public roads is heavily restricted at present,Navyas approach is supporting the early commercialisationof its vehicles.
